item.title: Boxcheck v2.0 is on the way
item.description: I’ve been a bit slow on new posts lately for two main reasons. First, I’ve been working hard with my new position at Slicehost, (I’m still with Rackspace). Also, I’ve thrown out the old code for Boxcheck.com and I’m re-writing it from scratch. Most of you probably know that the first version of Boxcheck threw out some odd errors for some tests and caused confusion for those that depended on the results.
